subject: how run a big file inwhich a lot of import files using junit
msgSnippet: hi all i have a AllServerTests.java class . i want to test it in junit. when we run it given its name in junit window then in Test Hierarchy all import file
messageBody:
hi all
i have a AllServerTests.java class . i want to test it in junit. when we run it given its name in junit window then in Test Hierarchy all import file names which occur in this file come like
com.plateform.source.AllServerTests and in it testupdatequery,....... occur.
but it gives error with red sign .i think that import classes can not understand by it of my project.pls help me.
vivek
